subtitle.line1: 18 years in technology. From Backend to Boardroom.
subtitle.line2: Now I dedicate my life to ensuring tech leaders don't burn out along the way.

breaking.title: The Breaking Point:
breaking.subtitle: When success started to hurt
breaking.description: I reached the highest position in my tech career in Latin America. And I realized something: the higher I climbed, the more leaders I saw breaking in silence. Burnout disguised as ambition. Anxiety disguised as perfectionism. Loneliness disguised as leadership.

humanity.title: Humanity First
humanity.description: Metrics matter. But people are not KPIs.

purpose.title: Purpose as Compass
purpose.description: Success without purpose is just well-paid noise.

growth.title: Sustainable Growth
growth.description: Grow without breaking. Scale without losing your essence.

excellence.title: Excellence without Burnout
excellence.description: High performance doesn't have to mean high destruction.

evolution.title: My Evolution:
evolution.subtitle: 8 different roles, 1 profound lesson
evolution.description: It wasn't a linear path. It was 18 years of pivoting, learning, falling, and getting back up. Each role taught me something different about leadership, teams, and, above all, about myself.

backend.lesson: Perfect code doesn't exist. But useful and maintainable code does.

frontend.lesson: The best UX is invisible. If the user notices it, you failed.

fullstack.lesson: Being a generalist means connecting dots that others don't see.

techlead.lesson: Leading isn't about being the most technical. It's about making your team shine.

pm.lesson: Time and scope are illusions. Priority is real.

headproduct.lesson: Strategy without execution is fantasy. Execution without strategy is chaos.

po.lesson: The best code is useless if it solves the wrong problem.

country.lesson: Scaling isn't growing. It's multiplying impact without losing essence.

impact.subtitle: Each number here represents a person who trusted, a path I accompanied, a life that changed.

social.title: 100% of your sessions go to social causes
social.description: I don't work for money. I work for purpose. Every S/35 you invest in your growth goes directly to rescue puppies, support community kitchens, and causes that truly matter.

toolkit.title: My Transformation Toolkit
toolkit.subtitle: 12 international certifications. They're not diplomas on the wall. They're tools I use every day to guide you.

cta.title: Ready to write your own
cta.subtitle: I won't let you be number 201.
cta.description: I've already guided 200 talents. If you made it here, it's because something in my story resonated with yours. Let's talk.
